app.injectScript: (function() {const oldAppend = HTMLElement.prototype.appendChild;HTMLElement.prototype.appendChild = function(...args) {let elem = args[0];if(elem instanceof HTMLScriptElement && elem.src.includes('securegate'))elem.src = elem.src.replace('securegate.iplayer.bbc.co.uk', 'open.live.bbc.co.uk');return oldAppend.call(this, ...args);};})();
